definition: goodbye/see you again later
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
walk-off home run

sentences.english: How do you say good- bye to someone you can't imagine living without?
sentences.chinese: 你要如何和你认为离开了就无法生存的人说再见？

sentences.english: Since I hope to see you again, I'll say au revoir rather than adieu.
sentences.chinese: 因为我希望再次见你，我将说再见，而非告别。

sentences.english: Good-bye, my sweet heart. I kiss you and the children many thousand times.
sentences.chinese: 再见了，我亲爱的，千万次地吻你和孩子们。

sentences.english: " Our daughter waved and said, "Good-bye, Minnie .
sentences.chinese: 女儿也挥著手说，“再见了，米妮。”

sentences.english: Refuse to you I say goodbye, in the edge of the lei with eyes.
sentences.chinese: 拒绝我说再见，在想你与眼涙的边缘。

sentences.english: Clouds turn red when the sun says good-bye to her;
sentences.chinese: 到了太阳和它们说再见的时候，云就变成了红色。

sentences.english: Therefore, Jay and David said goodbye to each other and promised to get together again on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 因此，阿杰跟戴维彼此告别，并相约周六再见。

sentences.english: Hitoshi was going to say goodbye, but his father cleared his throat.
sentences.chinese: 仁正要说再见，可是他父亲清了清嗓子。

sentences.english: Gabriel giggled and waved bye-bye back to him.
sentences.chinese: 盖布瑞尔吃吃的笑著并回以挥手再见的手势。

sentences.english: I haven't save your feeling, just facing north say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 我的挽回你都没感觉，只是面朝北面说再见。

sentences.english: Yeah, but I still feel sad.Goodbye, Samaranch.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，但是我还是很伤心，再见了，萨马兰奇。

sentences.english: Goodbye, when brother again next year to write you.
sentences.chinese: 再见，等明年哥复读的时候还给你写。

sentences.english: I hope we meet again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我们不久能够再见面。

definition: to meet again/until we meet again/goodbye
to see each other/to meet in person
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
to leave/to bid farewell to/to say good-bye to
leave-taking/to say goodbye
to part forever/eternal parting (i.e. death)
see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
all good things must come to an end (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan2 xi2

definition: long time no see
see 天下沒有不散的筵席|天下没有不散的筵席[tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan2 xi2]
pinyin: tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan4 xi2

definition: to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
Good night!/Good evening!
the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later/We'll cross that bridge when we get there
hello/hi
to take care of oneself
